title: How to Find and Join Clubs in College
description: Advice for joining clubs in college
author: Eliana M.
content:
When you first arrive on campus, choosing which clubs to join might seem a daunting task. Here are a few ways that may make the process a little easier.
Step One: Deciding which clubs to join
 Tip #1: Think about which extracurriculars you enjoyed in high school, and use these as a starting point from which to discover new activities.
 Tip #2: Think about what you didn’t do in high school. Is there anything you’ve always been curious about but have never had the opportunity to try?
 Tip #3: Attend club fairs, ask around, and be open-minded.

Step Two: How to actually join these clubs
 Tip #4: Just show up to a club meeting
 Tip #5: Find the club on social media.
 Tip #6: You don’t have to join right away.
